item.description:
Hey Gurus....

This is really last minute... I'm afraid that since I can't schedule anything next weekend and then there's almost Thanksgiving.... I thought I'd give a little cocktail party at my place on Friday.... for those of you I know and those who are welcome to join us for the first time. I will provide "lite bites." You are welcome to bring your beverage of choice and a favorite recipe to share. I'll send out a final rsvp, so you can bring the number of copies to exchange. This will be fun, lite and social.... Plenty of parking by the commuter train parking lot.

Sharon
item.name: Friday Night Mixer
